verse.name: c1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Coming home Coming home Never more to roam Open wide Thine arms of love Lord I'm coming home{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}I've wandered far Away from God Now I'm coming home The paths of sin Too long I've trod Lord I'm coming home{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}I've wasted many Precious years Now I'm coming home I now repent With bitter tears Lord I'm coming home{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}I'm tired of sin And straying Lord Now I'm coming home I'll trust Thy love Believe Thy word Lord I'm coming home{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}My soul is sick My heart is sore Now I'm coming home My strength renew My hope restore Lord I'm coming home{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: {lang-eng}I need His cleansing Blood I know Now I'm coming home Oh wash me whiter Than the snow Lord I'm coming home{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v6
verse.lines: {lang-eng}My only hope My only plea Now I'm coming home That Jesus died And died for me Lord I'm coming home{/lang-eng}
